thread.title: BRIEF-Internet Gold Golden Lines Ltd Says Board Elected Ami Barlev As Acting Chairman Of The Board Of The Company‍​

title: BRIEF-Internet Gold Golden Lines Ltd Says Board Elected Ami Barlev As Acting Chairman Of The Board Of The Company‍​

organizations.name: brief-internet gold golden lines ltd says board elected
board of the company‍​ reuters staff

text:
#Market News February 7, 2018 / 4:45 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Internet Gold Golden Lines Ltd Says Board Elected Ami Barlev As Acting Chairman Of The Board Of The Company‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Internet Gold Golden Lines Ltd: 
* INTERNET GOLD GOLDEN LINES LTD SAYS COMPANY‘S BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS ELECTED AMI BARLEV AS ACTING CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF THE COMPANY‍​ 
* INTERNET GOLD GOLDEN LINES LTD - BARLEV SUCCEEDS SHAUL ELOVITCH WHO WILL CONTINUE TO SERVE AS A DIRECTOR Source text - ( bit.ly/2nNCYzl ) Further company coverage:
